column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The first word that comes to mind is that everything was WONDERFUL.  Pastries were great (not super sweet like most bakeries nowadays) and their coffee has character. When I mean character
column2: they draw items as requested in the counter when you order.  I first ordered a dragon but the guy that does it was out (hehe)
column3: the swan was beautifully done and was my second choice.  This place is quaint and i'll definitely put this in my list next time I visit Houston.
